entry.title: Hello,world!
entry.content:
Hi! I am a beginner in computer graphics and am trying to learn about it. The opportunity to get into this field was my favorite movie Interstellar, and I’m very interested in the computer graphics techniques involved, so I’ll be doing more in-depth studies I will share my notes with some insights on this site.

Also I’m interested in tarot card divination and rock music, and I share some of my interesting life here.

Welcome like-minded people to contact me for more communication!
